qoute: Ability may get you to the top, but it takes character to keep you there.
A talent for drama is not a talent for writing, but is an ability to articulate human relationships.
Education is the ability to listen to almost anything without losing your temper or your self-confidence.
I know of no more encouraging fact than the unquestionable ability of man to elevate his life by conscious endeavor.
A retentive memory may be a good thing, but the ability to forget is the true token of greatness.
Ability without honor is useless.
Genius is the ability to put into effect what is in your mind.
A disposition to preserve, and an ability to improve, taken together, would be my standard of a statesman.
Ability hits the mark where presumption overshoots and diffidence falls short.
Ability may get you to the top, but it takes character to keep you there.
A talent for drama is not a talent for writing, but is an ability to articulate human relationships.
Education is the ability to listen to almost anything without losing your temper or your self-confidence.
I know of no more encouraging fact than the unquestionable ability of man to elevate his life by conscious endeavor.
A retentive memory may be a good thing, but the ability to forget is the true token of greatness.
Ability without honor is useless.
Genius is the ability to put into effect what is in your mind.
A disposition to preserve, and an ability to improve, taken together, would be my standard of a statesman.
Ability hits the mark where presumption overshoots and diffidence falls short.
Ability is a poor man's wealth.
Ability is a poor man's wealtli.
Ability is commonly found to consist mainly in a high degree of solemnity.
Ability is of little account without opportunity.
Ability will never catch up with the demand for it.
An attack upon our ability to tell stories is not just censorship - it is a crime against our nature as human beings.
Being competent means the ability to control and operate the things in the environment and the environment itself.
Big jobs usually go to the men who prove their ability to outgrow small ones.
Certain brief sentences are peerless in their ability to give one the feeling that nothing remains to be said.
Consider the postage stamp, my son. It secures success through its ability to stick to one thing till it gets there.
Discipline is the refining fire by which talent becomes ability.
Don't measure yourself by what you have accomplished, but by what you should have accomplished with your ability.
Every man's ability may be strengthened or increased by culture.
Executive ability is deciding quickly and getting someone else to do the work.
Exigencies create the necessary ability to meet and conquer them.
From each, according to his ability; to each, according to his need.
Genius is the ability to act rightly without precedent - the power to do the right thing the first time.
Honesty is the cornerstone of all success, without which confidence and ability to perform shall cease to exist.
I always felt that my greatest asset was not my physical ability, it was my mental ability.
I always thought I could play pro ball. I had confidence in my ability, You have to. If you don't who will?
I have faith in the United States and our ability to make good decisions based on the facts.
I rose by sheer military ability to the rank of corporal.
I sometimes think that God in creating man somewhat overestimated his ability.
I sometimes think that God, in creating man, overestimated His ability.
I've got a woman's ability to stick to a job and get on with it when everyone else walks off and leaves it.
If we decide to take this level of business creating ability nationwide, we'll all be plucking chickens for a living.
In spite of his practical ability, some of his experience had petrified into maxims and quotations.
Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change.
It generally happens that assurance keeps an even pace with ability.
It is a fine thing to have ability, but the ability to discover ability in others is the true test.
It is the style of idealism to console itself for the loss of something old with the ability to gape at something new.
Lack of will power has caused more failure than lack of intelligence or ability.
Language is courage: the ability to conceive a thought, to speak it, and by doing so to make it true.
Love's greatest gift is its ability to make everything it touches sacred.
Luck? Sure. But only after long practice and only with the ability to think under pressure.
Man's greatness consists in his ability to do and the proper application of his powers to things needed to be done.
Martyrdom is the only way a man can become famous without ability.
Martyrdom is the only way a person can become famous without ability.
Maturity is the ability to reap without apology and not complain when things don't go well.
My ability to concentrate and work toward that goal has been my greatest asset.
My God given talent is my ability to stick with training longer than anybody else.
My most brilliant achievement was my ability to be able to persuade my wife to marry me.
My son, observe the postage stamp! Its usefulness depends upon its ability to stick to one thing until it gets there.
Nature, not content with denying him the ability to think, has endowed him with the ability to write.
Never underestimate your problem or your ability to deal with it.
No amount of ability is of the slightest avail without honor.
No matter what the level of your ability, you have more potential than you can ever develop in a lifetime.
No one would have doubted his ability to reign had he never been emperor.
One of the definitions of sanity is the ability to tell real from unreal. Soon we'll need a new definition.
One of the tests of leadership is the ability to recognize a problem before it becomes an emergency.
Our duty, as men and women, is to proceed as if limits to our ability did not exist. We are collaborators in creation.
Our power is in our ability to decide.
Patience is not simply the ability to wait - it's how we behave while we're waiting.
Peace is not the absence of conflict, but the ability to cope with conflict by peaceful means.
Peak performers see the ability to manage change as a necessity in fulfilling their missions.
Personal power is the ability to take action.
Political success is the ability, when the inevitable occurs, to get credit for it.
Self-respect is the root of discipline; the sense of dignity grows with the ability to say no to oneself.
Studies serve for delight, for ornaments, and for ability.
Success is the maximum utilization of the ability that you have.
Tact is the ability to describe others as they see themselves.
The ability to be in the present moment is a major component of mental wellness.
The ability to concentrate and to use time well is everything.
The ability to express an idea is well nigh as important as the idea itself.
The ability to manage well doesn't make much difference if you're not even in the right jungle.
The ability to quote is a serviceable substitute for wit.
The English have an extraordinary ability for flying into a great calm.
The foremost art of kings is the ability to endure hatred.
The greatest difficulty with the world is not its ability to produce, but the unwillingness to share.
The greatest weapon against stress is our ability to choose one thought over another.
The highest reward that God gives us for good work is the ability to do better work.
The leader of genius must have the ability to make different opponents appear as if they belonged to one category.
The mark of a great player is in his ability to come back. The great champions have all come back from defeat.
The only good luck many great men ever had was being born with the ability and determination to overcome bad luck.
The sign of an intelligent people is their ability to control emotions by the application of reason.
The will is commendable though the ability may be wanting.
There are evils that have the ability to survive identification and go on for ever... money, for instance, or war.
There are no grades of vanity, there are only grades of ability in concealing it.
There is far more opportunity than there is ability.
There is something that is much more scarce, something rarer than ability. It is the ability to recognize ability.
Time goes by, reputation increases, ability declines.
To know how to hide one's ability is great skill.
Vitality shows in not only the ability to persist but the ability to start over.
We all have ability. The difference is how we use it.
We cherish our friends not for their ability to amuse us, but for our ability to amuse them.
We don't need more strength or more ability or greater opportunity. What we need is to use what we have.
Wealth is the ability to fully experience life.
When I think of vision, I have in mind the ability to see above and beyond the majority.
Wicked people are always surprised to find ability in those that are good.
Wisdom is not attained by years, but by ability.
With people of limited ability modesty is merely honesty. But with those who possess great talent it is hypocrisy.
You are the only person on earth who can use your ability.
You have to have confidence in your ability, and then be tough enough to follow through.
Your greatest asset is your earning ability. Your greatest resource is your time.
Youth is happy because it has the ability to see beauty. Anyone who keeps the ability to see beauty never grows old.
Ability is what you're capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it.
